title: Rebirth of Miss Jiao of the Republic of China - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Revenge   Second Chance
author: Shi Yue Wei Wei Liang   Slightly Cool October   十月微微凉
description:
Passion and revenge around Shanghai beach. The story is about the growth of the wealthy ‘doing Heaven and Earth’ Miss Jiao.

Rebirth without revenge was like living in vain.

Tang Jiao, dressed in western style and holding a sutra, was shaking her legs while sitting on the wall. She asked herself, with so many enemies, which one should I start first with?

Gu Tingyun was watching her, the delicate girl. He smiled and kept shut while pinching the beads. Click clack. And he thought, Little Bastard...don’t let me find you…!

Sadistic but cool and original novel placed in the Republic of China. Step by step, the first-class and ‘do Heaven and Earth’ Big Boss will fiercely swallow the distressed but pretty Lolita Jiao in his stomach.>
